TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool ChangeAllowedCheck(object sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties beforeProperties, SPWorkflowTaskProperties afterProperties, string executor, out string reason);
.class public auto ansi sealed ChangeAllowedCheck extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function ChangeAllowedCheck(sender As Object, taskId As Guid, beforeProperties As SPWorkflowTaskProperties, afterProperties As SPWorkflowTaskProperties, executor As String, ByRef reason As String) As Boolean

public delegate bool ChangeAllowedCheck(System::Object ^ sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties ^ beforeProperties, SPWorkflowTaskProperties ^ afterProperties, System::String ^ executor, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % reason);

Docs.param: An object that represents the caller of the ChangeAllowedCheck type.
A GUID that represents the workflow task identifier (ID).
An SPWorkflowTaskProperties object that contains the property values before the properties are changed.
An SPWorkflowTaskProperties object that contains the property values after the properties are changed.
The ID of the user who executed the event.
A string that contains the reason for the change.
Docs.summary: A delegate that can be used to verify whether the workflow task properties can be changed.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value that indicates whether or not the workflow task is can be changed.
